</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Beastmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=50) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
an animal companion; warden spells

</column>

You can defend your companion in battle. You gain the [_magic hide_](/Spells.aspx?ID=774) warden spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
